text: Letâ€™s a make a second GONG with this <http://www.creativeapplications.net/openframeworks/nelson-tiny-device-that-helps-push-a-switch-on-everyday-objects/>

attachments.text: Created by Maxime Castelli at ECAL (Bachelor Media & Interaction Design), Nelson is a tiny connected module designed to bring life remotely to everyday objects. It's based on a very simple foreward and backward movement as we do in the everyday life, like pushing a switch.
